ComicInfo.Title: Eulogy
ComicInfo.Summary:
After the disastrous raid on Marduk, Toshiro's clone Hotachi pays his respects at his brother's funeral.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-08 08:11:24. [CVDB247841]
